file_content.text: Havoc Team Two to command--all ambushers neutralized. We are regrouping and advancing to sweep any remaining infantry. Dorne out.
Jorgan here--Rakton's flank team is history. We're going to move up and sweep for any leftovers--see you inside. Out.
Team Two reporting--all Imps are down here. Time to move up and clean up--see you soon. Jorgan out.
Havoc Team Two--enemy ambushers neutralized. We will regroup and advance with caution. Dorne out.
Unit Four is down! Units One and Five, move to cover them--keep firing!
Anti-armor teams spotted! All units, focus fire!
Fifty-third reporting. Initial blast results positive, advancing and preparing second blast. Estimate seven total blasts needed, will update shortly. Lesher out.
Focus your fire! Bring it down! Team Two, advance!
We're through! Go, go, go! Team Three, you're next--show me those charges!
Coria here. Progress is slow, but we're clear so far. Hope the rest of you are having fun.
Havoc Team Two in position. Enemy speeders approaching now--we will advise if any forces escape our ambush. Dorne out.
Havoc Team Two in position. Rakton's flanking team is right on time--welcome party is prepared. Will advise of any runners--Jorgan out.
Havoc Team Two in position. Welcome party is staged, and Rakton's flankers have been confirmed. Will advise if anyone escapes--Jorgan out.
Havoc Team Two in position. Enemy forces incoming, as predicted--proceeding with ambush as planned. Dorne out.
Fifty-third reporting. Enemy contact established--moving into weapon range now. For the Republic!
Fifty-third reporting. Enemy infantry positions spotted--advancing to weapon range now. For the Republic!
Fifty-third reporting. Automated defenses and mines detected as reported. Charging main guns for area blast--will update shortly. Lesher out.
Coria here. Enemy armor spotted--they're big, but we brought the big toys. Moving into position now--out.
Coria here. Approaching enemy infantry positions now. Explosive charges and entry weapons prepped and ready. They don't know what they're in for--out.
Coria here. Automated defenses and mines are confirmed--we're proceeding with caution. Out.
